0.name: The Chug
0.desc: Finish your drink in one attempt.

1.name: Big Hands
1.desc: Find someone with bigger hands and make a hand-by-hand comparison

2.name: Ageism
2.desc: Find two people the same age as you

3.name: Inception
3.desc: Take a photo of someone else taking a photo of you.

4.name: Three Wise Monkeys
4.desc: Take a photo of 3 people doing 'See no evil', 'Hear no evil', 'Speak no evil'

5.name: Do These Make Me Look Horrible?
5.desc: Borrow a pair of glasses that don't work at all on your face

0.name: Diplomatic Photo-op
0.desc: Find someone who disagrees with you on an issue. Then shake hands, smile, and waive at the camera.

1.name: More Necklace
1.desc: Take a picture with 3 or more necklaces you can borrow

2.name: Siphon
2.desc: Drink an entire beer through a straw

3.name: Make it a Three-Way
3.desc: Have a thumb-war of 3 or more people.

4.name: It's My Party and I'll Smile if I Want to
4.desc: Take a picture with the host

0.name: Bearded Men Fantasy
0.desc: Get a picture with 2 bearded men, who can't be smiling and must be flexing in some way.

1.name: Porcelain
1.desc: Snap a picture of you (or someone else) sitting on a toilet.

2.name: Human Incline
2.desc: Take a group photo of at least 5 people in ascending height

1.name: Poem
1.desc: Write a poem and give it to someone you haven't met before tonight.

2.name: Switcheroo
2.desc: Switch an item of clothing with someone you've never met before tonight

1.name: Porcelain
1.desc: Snap a picture of you (or someone else) sitting on a toilet.

2.name: Proposal
2.desc: Propose to someone you didn't know before tonight
